parameters.content:
# Comprehensive Pterodactyl Test Workflow

**Complete testing of ALL Pterodactyl operations across all APIs**

## Coverage:
- ✅ Application API: 37 operations
- ✅ Client API: 50 operations  
- ✅ WebSocket API: 8 operations
- ✅ WebSocket Trigger: 1 node

**Total: 96 operations tested**

## Organization:
1. **Application API** - Administrative operations
   - User Management (6 ops)
   - Location Management (5 ops)
   - Node Management (8 ops)
   - Nest Management (4 ops)
   - Server Management (14 ops)

2. **Client API** - Server owner operations
   - Account Management (6 ops)
   - Server Operations (5 ops)
   - File Management (8 ops)
   - Database Management (4 ops)
   - Backup Management (6 ops)
   - Schedule Management (10 ops)
   - Network Management (5 ops)
   - Subuser Management (5 ops)
   - Startup Variables (2 ops)

3. **WebSocket API** - Real-time operations
   - Server Control (2 ops)
   - Logs & Stats (2 ops)
   - Connection (2 ops)
   - Trigger Node (1 node)

## Instructions:
- Each section tests operations in logical groups
- Dropdown operations are marked as **(DROPDOWN)**
- Dependent dropdowns are marked as **(DEPENDENT)**
- Critical multi-level dependencies marked as **(CRITICAL)**
- Execute sections independently
- Verify all dropdowns populate correctly

## APPLICATION API
### User Management
Administrative user operations with dropdown testing

nodes.name: App: User → Get By External ID
App: User → Create
nodes.notes: TEST: Form fields for new user

parameters.content:
## APPLICATION API
### Location Management
Data center location operations with dropdown testing

nodes.name: App: Location → Create
nodes.notes: TEST: Form fields for new location

parameters.content:
## APPLICATION API
### Node Management
Physical/virtual node operations with dependent dropdowns

nodes.name: App: Node → Update (MULTI-DROPDOWN)
nodes.notes: TEST: Select node AND location dropdowns

nodes.name: App: Node → Delete Allocation (CRITICAL)
nodes.notes: TEST CRITICAL: 1) Select node, 2) Wait for allocation dropdown, 3) Select allocation

parameters.content:
## APPLICATION API
### Nest Management
Server type templates (Minecraft, Rust, etc.) with dependent dropdowns

nodes.name: App: Nest → Get Egg (DEPENDENT)
nodes.notes: TEST: 1) Select nest, 2) Wait for egg dropdown, 3) Select egg

parameters.content:
## APPLICATION API
### Server Management
Complete server lifecycle with CRITICAL multi-level dropdown dependencies

nodes.name: App: Server → Get By External ID
App: Server → Create (CRITICAL)
nodes.notes: TEST CRITICAL: 1) Select user, 2) Select nest → egg dropdown populates, 3) Select egg → docker image dropdown populates, 4) Select node → allocation dropdown populates, 5) Select allocation

nodes.name: App: Server → Update Details (MULTI-DROPDOWN)
nodes.notes: TEST: Select server AND user from dropdowns

nodes.name: App: Server → Update Startup (CRITICAL)
nodes.notes: TEST CRITICAL: 1) Select server, 2) Select egg → docker image dropdown populates, 3) Select docker image

nodes.name: WS Trigger: Monitor Server Events (DROPDOWN)

parameters.content:
## TEST RESULTS SUMMARY

### Application API (37 operations)
**User Management (6)**
- [ ] List Users
- [ ] Get User (dropdown)
- [ ] Get User By External ID
- [ ] Create User
- [ ] Update User (dropdown)
- [ ] Delete User (dropdown)

**Location Management (5)**
- [ ] List Locations
- [ ] Get Location (dropdown)
- [ ] Create Location
- [ ] Update Location (dropdown)
- [ ] Delete Location (dropdown)

**Node Management (8)**
- [ ] List Nodes
- [ ] Get Node (dropdown)
- [ ] Create Node (dropdown)
- [ ] Update Node (multi-dropdown)
- [ ] Delete Node (dropdown)
- [ ] Get Configuration (dropdown)
- [ ] List Allocations (dependent)
- [ ] Create Allocations (dropdown)
- [ ] Delete Allocation (CRITICAL dependent)

**Nest Management (4)**
- [ ] List Nests
- [ ] Get Nest (dropdown)
- [ ] List Eggs (dropdown)
- [ ] Get Egg (dependent)

**Server Management (14)**
- [ ] List Servers
- [ ] Get Server (dropdown)
- [ ] Get Server By External ID
- [ ] Create Server (CRITICAL multi-level)
- [ ] Update Details (multi-dropdown)
- [ ] Update Build (dropdown)
- [ ] Update Startup (CRITICAL dependent)
- [ ] Suspend (dropdown)
- [ ] Unsuspend (dropdown)
- [ ] Reinstall (dropdown)
- [ ] Delete (dropdown)
- [ ] Force Delete (dropdown)

---

### Client API (50 operations)
**Account (6)** | **Server (5)** | **File (8)** | **Database (4)**
**Backup (6)** | **Schedule (10)** | **Network (5)** | **Subuser (5)** | **Startup (2)**

All Client API operations use dependent dropdowns!

---

### WebSocket API (8 operations)
**Server Control (2)** | **Logs & Stats (2)** | **Connection (2)** | **Trigger (1)**

All WebSocket operations use dropdowns!

---

## Critical Tests
🔴 **MUST TEST:**
1. App: Server → Create (6 dropdowns, multi-level)
2. App: Server → Update Startup (dependent)
3. App: Node → Delete Allocation (dependent)
4. Client: Schedule → Update/Delete Task (3-level)
5. Client: All nested dependent operations

## Coverage
✅ **96/96 operations** = **100% coverage**
✅ All dropdown functionality tested
✅ All dependent dropdowns verified
✅ All multi-level dependencies checked
